room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I do lots of escape rooms.  I wouldn't call this one the highest difficulty level because my group of two escaped without clues.  It was still fun and you will enjoy.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: So much fun. It took all 8 of us to get out of the casino in time. We were given clues and had to problem solve on the fly. A great teambuilding exercise and an honest hour of good fun.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Best game so far in Dallas/Plano area. Casino escape was fantastic... great staff and enjoyable. There are many places in the area and will be trying more, but after 3 this is so far my favorite.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Really well done. Did the Casino escape. Great job done by game master, with just the right amount of help. Loved the laser beam part!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My husband and I had a lot of fun doing our first escape room with just the two of us here! Jeff our game master was really nice and a great help when we needed it! We really enjoyed Operation: Casino and would be up to do another escape room here next time weâ€™re in town.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a blast with my family doing the casino room. It was challenging and fun. We did escape but needed a little help. We want to come back and do another one soon!
